transArray.content: The room was clean and tidy. The service was good. I stayed here for a few days and the service staff were great.

Dear guest, thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel, and thank you even more for taking time out of your busy schedule to encourage us. We treat every guest as our own family and strive to make every guest feel at home here, and your recognition is our greatest motivation. Our guest room sisters carefully prepare every room every day, and all the hotel staff look forward to your every visit. I wish you a happy holiday! General Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
